title: Sentence Parser
description: Parse sentences in multiple languages (English, Japanese, Chinese) with Unicode support and language detection based on character sets.

motivation.why: Sentence boundary detection is essential for text processing, NLP pipelines, and multilingual applications. Different languages use different punctuation marks for sentence boundaries.

inputFormat.description: Text in various languages with language-specific sentence terminators: .!? for English, 。！？ for CJK languages.
inputFormat.syntax: sentence = text + terminator (terminator varies by language)

examples.input: Hello world. This is a test! How are you?
こんにちは世界。これはテストです。元気ですか？
你好世界。这是一个测试！你好吗？
Hello world. こんにちは。This is mixed! 混合文本。

outputFormat.description: The parser returns a list of Sentence structs, each containing the text and detected language.

Sentence.description: Struct with text: String and language: Language
